SEARCH
Module CompulsoryTask2L3T08
Package taskL3T08

Class ProjectManager

java.lang.Object
taskL3T08.ProjectManager
public class ProjectManager extends Object
The ProjectManager class handles all operations related to projects in the database. This includes inserting, updating, deleting, finalizing, and reading projects.

    • insertProject

      public void insertProject(Connection connection, String projectNumber, String projectName, String buildingType, String physicalAddress, String erfNumber, double totalFee, double totalPaid, String deadline, int architectId, int contractorId, int customerId, int structuralEngineerId, int projectManagerId) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new project into the database.
      Parameters:
      connection - The database connection.
      projectNumber - The project number.
      projectName - The name of the project.
      buildingType - The type of building.
      physicalAddress - The physical address of the project.
      erfNumber - The ERF number of the project.
      totalFee - The total fee for the project.
      totalPaid - The total amount paid for the project.
      deadline - The deadline for the project.
      architectId - The ID of the architect.
      contractorId - The ID of the contractor.
      customerId - The ID of the customer.
      structuralEngineerId - The ID of the structural engineer.
      projectManagerId - The ID of the project manager.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
